QuestData.Title: The Final Flame of Bashal'Aran
QuestData.Description: It is in times like these that we are forced to stop and examine our way of life. We are mortal now, and no matter how much we desire otherwise, we are deserving of our new place in this world.$B$BBashal'Aran, down the road to the south, once a city of our ancestors, it now is home to their cursed ghosts. We held hope of salvation for them as with ourselves, but we have left them in torment for too long. It is time to extinguish the Final Flame of Bashal'Aran.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Extinguish the Final Flame of Bashal'Aran
QuestData.LogDescription: Extinguish the Final Flame of Bashal'Aran.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ranger Glynda Nal'Shea in Lor'danel.
QuestData.RewardText: You have our thanks. It is time that we leave the past behind us, and start looking to our future.
